title: Taj Mahal Being Cleaned Just Before Trump’s Visit? No, It’s Fake
subtitle: Taj Mahal Viral Video Fact Check:: Video of a Taj Mahal-like structure in People’s Mall in Bhopal is being shared to claim that cleaning of Agra’s Taj Mahal was underway just before US President Donald Trump was about to visit the monument.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Right before Trump was to visit Taj Mahal, a video was shared on social media that claimed that the last-minute cleaning of the majestic monument was still underway.

Taking a dig at the government, Twitter user ‘Aaftab Hasan’ shared the video and wrote, “To show Donald Trump the cleaning of Taj Mahal is underway.”
